H0.text: In 2010 which country saw the Red Shirt Rebellion. Thailand

H1.text: In 2010 which country saw the Red Shirt Rebellion. Cambodia

H2.text: In 2010 which country saw the Red Shirt Rebellion. Malaysia

H3.text: In 2010 which country saw the Red Shirt Rebellion. Siam

A4.text: The 2010 Thai political protests were organised by the United Front for Democracy Against Dictatorship (UDD) (also known as 'Red Shirts') in Bangkok, Thailand from 12 Marchâ€“19 May 2010 against the Democrat Party-led government.

A5.text: The Red Shirts organised mass rallies across Thailand to mark the ousting of former Thai Prime Minister Thaksin by a military coup four years earlier
